transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir good morning.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan good morning.
Customer: Good morning sir, mera naam Komal hai, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu aap se.
Customer: Haan madam Komal boliye.
Executive: Sir aapne kal call kara tha to kal hai na hamara off tha.
Customer: Off tha. Haan Komal ji hai na wo parso sir se baat hui thi wo Komal madam ko bol denge wo bata rahe the ki wo sab category add karni hai aur buylead bhi kam aa rahi hai bahut.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji sir, naam Komal hi hai aur mere ko hi bola tha unhone. To maine aapko iske regarding 4 tarikh ko call kara tha to aap us time pe matlab aapne call nahi receive kara tha.
Customer: Wo main along market gaya tha isliye maine aapko call receive nahi kiya main.
Executive: Achha koi baat nahi. To basically aapka jo main concern wo yahi hai ki aapko less buylead aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haan buylead buylead matlab bahut kam aa rahi hai do teen din mein ek aa rahi hai aur wo puri 10 buylead milti hai wo week mein wo bhi nahi mil rahi hai aur kam aa rahi hai jo matlab related product hai na wo list kare uske buylead related bahut kam aa rahi hai buylead.
Executive: Theek hai buylead ka aap ek issue bata rahe hain. Second issue aapne kya bataya tha ki aapko basically aapko categories ka karna tha. Right?
Customer: Haan wo set ki requirement jo hai uske related buylead nahi aati ki usme bataya tha maine.
Executive: Ek second main aapko ye open karu ek minute.
Executive: Aapne jo last buylead consume kari hai wo 3 tarikh ko 3 buylead consume kari hui hai. Hai na ji?
Customer: Kal raat ko ek ki thi maine.
Executive: Kal raat ko ek kari thi 5 tarikh thi kal kal aapke isme hame dikha raha hai ki aapne 3 buylead consume kari hui hai. Dayakar, Ayush aur Elite Engineering Service.
Customer: Usko join lo to aaya wo matlab ki thi maine.
Executive: Achha theek hai matlab teeno mein se kisi se conversion aaya aapka?
Customer: Hmm ki ek Rahul sir ne bataya tha wo ek wo unhone bataya ki main confirmation dunga aapko ek do din mein.
Executive: Rahul sir se jo aapki hui thi wo 3 tarikh ko hui thi 3 November ko Rahul Chaudhary se right?
Customer: Haan yes right. Aur uske baad jaise Sunil, Amar, Sharukh, Dayakar, Ayush in sab se bhi aapki baat hui hai matlab.
Customer: Nahi wo usne call receive nahi kiya. Dayakar usne call receive nahi kiya tha kal matlab bataya tha na maine.
Executive: Achha achha inhone call receive nahi kara theek hai.
Customer: Hmm. Aur kisi se?
Customer: Ki wo whatsapp mein baat hui whatsapp mein message kiya tha wo ki bolenge.
Executive: Theek hai aap unko whatsapp pe ek baar dobara connect karna and uske baad aapka ye tha ki aapko less buyleads aa rahi hai right? Aapka all over India tha na?
Customer: Haan all over India.
Executive: Kis mein deal karte hain aap flavored breathing device mein?
Customer: Haan wo set pe bhi pura set aata hai usme bhi main dealing karta hu usme related buylead bhi kam aa rahi hai wo maine list bhi diya hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Aap sabse jyada jis mein deal karte hain wo scuba cylinder hai.
Customer: Isi mein deal karte hain cylinder haan yes.
Executive: Theek hai. To iski buyleads aapko show kar rahi hain?
Customer: Haan matlab aa rahi hai par mere matlab din mein ek aa rahi hai kuch ek tarikh din mein nahi aa rahi hai wo do din mein ek wo aise aa rahi hai aur jo set ki requirement hai wo to uske related buylead kam aa rahi hai bahut kam aa rahi hai.
Executive: Sir uski bhi kam aa rahi hai aapki. Sir bol rahe the category add karna hai aapko category add nahi hai isme.
Executive: Category addition ka bola tha na unhone aapko?
Customer: Haan wo.
Executive: Theek hai main ek kaam karti hu main aapki video mein schedule kar rahi hu aap ek baar online aa jaiye aur main isme jo category add kar rahi hu ek baar mujhe bata dijiye ki yahi yahi category add hogi ya nahi.
Customer: Nahi aapko aadhe ghante mein call back karo connect karne ke liye.
Executive: Kya cheez aapki aawaz nahi aa rahi.
Customer: Wo aadhe ghante 30 minute ke baad aapko connect karte hain aadhe ghante ke baad.
Executive: Theek hai main 30 minute baad connect karti hu to video meet aap tabhi karenge?
Customer: Haan wo online connect kar lenge wo.
Executive: Theek hai to main aapko 30 minute baad connect karti hu aap mujhe us time pe bata dena main aapki category jo bhi hai sab addition kara dungi.
Customer: Okay okay okay madam okay.
Executive: Okay thank you so much.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Buyleads are very less, one in two-three days.

- Not receiving full 10 buyleads per week.

- Buyleads related to set requirements are very less.

- Category addition is required.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed the last buylead consumption date.

- Executive offered to schedule a video meet.

- Executive offered to add the required categories.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect after 30 minutes for video meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category addition, video meet, subscription
